*
 * Wrap glob invocation into {@link Promise}.
 *
 * @private
 * @param {string} pattern Glob pattern.
 * @param {string} path Path, in which search should begin.
 * @returns {Promise<string[],Error>} Promise resolving to found
 * file paths.
